Text: Do I need to install all previous updates or only last one?

User Type: ed to copy and paste these files into the game folder and overwrite as required. No crack file to play this game....Jesus help you child. It is an UPDATE. You will probably need help actually playing PC games when you cant read/understand simple concepts like this.

You will already have copied a crack into the game folder from the main game you installed (or probably not in your case) and as this update doesnt change the .exe file you are ok to copy and update like this.  "
